mapper.select: select f.fri_snum, m.mem_id fri_mem_id, m.mem_name fri_mem_name, m.mem_snum fri_mem_snum, m.mem_profile fri_mem_profile from fri_list f, member m where f.fri_mem_snum = m.mem_snum and f.mem_snum = #{mem_snum }
select count(f.fri_snum) following_count from fri_list f, member m where f.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select count(f.fri_snum) follower_count from fri_list f, member m where f.fri_mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id}

select f.fri_snum, s.mem_snum fri_mem_snum, s.mem_id fri_mem_id, s.mem_profile fri_mem_profile, decode(s.mem_snum, f.fri_mem_snum, 1, 0) ismyfriend from (select m.mem_snum, m.mem_id, m.mem_profile from member m where m.mem_id like '%' || #{mem_id} || '%') s, fri_list f where f.mem_snum(+) = #{userNo} and f.FRI_MEM_SNUM(+)= s.mem_snum
